deals.name: Romantic Valentine's Escape
deals.description: Celebrate love with a luxurious getaway. Enjoy complimentary spa treatments, candlelit dinners, and breathtaking views to make your moments unforgettable.

deals.name: Anniversary Celebration
deals.description: Join us in celebrating our resort's anniversary with exclusive perks! Enjoy special discounts, festive events, and delightful surprises throughout your stay.

deals.name: Enchanting Christmas
deals.description: Unwrap joy this holiday season with our exclusive Christmas package. Experience festive feasts, cozy accommodations, and magical winter activities.

faqs.question: What time is check-in and check-out?
faqs.answer: Check-in starts at 2:00 PM, and check-out is at 12:00 PM. Early check-in and late check-out are available upon request, subject to availability and additional charges.

faqs.question: Are pets allowed at the resort?
faqs.answer: No, pets aren't allowed in the resort for some reasons.

faqs.question: Do you offer airport shuttle services?
faqs.answer: No, we can't provide a shuttle services.

faqs.question: What activities are available at the resort?
faqs.answer: Our resort offers a range of activities, including snorkeling, guided nature walks, spa treatments, and a kid's club. Seasonal events and activities are also organized throughout the year.
